sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from "react" import "./style/projects.css" import weatherApp from "./media/weather.png" import diam from "./media/diam.png" import memorycards from "./media/STEINS.png" import yordles from "./media/yordlee.png" import lostArk from "./media/lostArk.jpg" import inventory from "./media/inventory.png" import posts from "./media/posts.png" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCoffee, faShoppingCart,faUser } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faGithub } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import { useEffect } from "react" import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer' const iconGithub = const Projects = () => { const { ref, inView, entry } = useInView({ /* Optional options */ threshold: 0, }) return (

MY PROJECTS

Weather App

A weather forecast site using the weather API OpenWeather

LIVE PREVIEW
{iconGithub}
Shopping Cart

E-commerce application project built with React

LIVE PREVIEW
{iconGithub}
Memory card game

Funny game project built with React

LIVE PREVIEW
{iconGithub}
Find the yordles !

A Where's waldo like game with Yordles from league of legends ! Built with React and firebase database

LIVE PREVIEW
{iconGithub}
Lost Ark site

Replica of the official Lost Ark site, built with React

LIVE PREVIEW
{iconGithub}
Inventory app

Inventory application for keyboards built with nodejs/express and using MongoDB database

LIVE PREVIEW
{iconGithub}
Posts app

Posts project site, if you log in you can post messages ! Built with nodejs/express and using MongoDB database.

LIVE PREVIEW
{iconGithub}
) } export default Projects
